summary: A base utility that prepares image data and associated metadata for disk storage, handling dimension ordering, channel placement, affine transformations, optional resampling, and data type conversion, while delegating format‑specific creation and writing to subclass implementations.
business_intent: Enable consistent, extensible saving of 2D/3D images (including multi‑time or multi‑channel data) across various backends by abstracting preprocessing steps such as channel‑last conversion, affine metadata management, and resampling, so developers can focus on backend specifics.
